bullets: Web development involves building websites and applications using technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It is split into frontend (user interface) and backend (server-side logic). This project explores web tech stacks, modern frameworks, and full-stack development trends. It also covers responsive design, accessibility, and performance optimization in real-world scenarios.
slide_3.title: Introduction

bullets: Our project dives into how websites are designed, developed, and deployed using modern tools and best practices.

bullets: To learn about core web technologies
To build a responsive web app

bullets: Each member handled frontend or backend tasks
We used Git for version control and VS Code for development

bullets: The development process revealed how component-based design improves reusability and scalability in modern apps.
